summary: Restored Hero.tsx component from git backup. The file was empty (0 lines) causing the website to crash. Restored from git HEAD:src/components/Hero.tsx, fixed import paths (data/products and Product3DViewer), and added pt-24 padding for fixed header. Build successful.
current_status: Hero component restored and fixed. All import paths corrected. Build successful. Website should now display correctly with the hero section showing the living room scene with rug.
